lead_paragraph: KAYE--Hon. Judith S. The lawyers and staff of Proskauer mourn the loss of our friend the Hon. Judith S. Kaye, the former Chief Judge of the State of New York, and wife of our esteemed and beloved late colleague Stephen Rackow Kaye, who served as senior partner and former Chair of our Litigation and Dispute Resolution Department. Judith was one of the nation's most esteemed jurists and public servants of her time. She was a true role model and helped to pave the way for future generations of women to succeed in the law. Judith exemplified the fundamental values of the profession, and we were profoundly privileged to have had Judith as a friend for the last 50 years. 1/3
